member.name: T:DContainer.Autofac.ServiceLocatorAdapter
member.summary: Translates calls from IServiceLocator to Spring.NET's IListableObjectFactory-based containers

member.name: M:DContainer.Autofac.ServiceLocatorAdapter.DoGetInstance(System.Type,System.String)
member.param: Name of registered service you want. May be null.
member.returns: The requested service instance or null, if is not found.

member.name: M:DContainer.Autofac.ServiceLocatorAdapter.DoGetAllInstances(System.Type)
member.returns: Sequence of service instance objects matching the .
